answers.answer: If your not wanting to travel an hr every month then I would call the new one n get an appt

I wished I didn't have to on sept 25 but I have.to do the second half.of the test they started last month I don't feel like myself so my boyfriend is going to go.with me . How soon should.I get.the appt with the new ob
U shuld get the appt with the new ob asap.just so u can get all ur new patient forms filled out and meet with ur new doc.

No problem I switched my doc becauze of that  problem at 18 weeks and I didnt even get in with the new doc till I was almost 20 weeks because my old doctors office took FOREVER	to,send my files and stuff to the new doc office! It was crazy! Good luck!

I am going sept 25 to the old Dr for my last appt I will either get my file then or make sure they are faced asap I am already feeling like.crap all the time. Was not like this with my other pregnancy so I am a little freaked.out I just want one normal.pregnancy my first two.pregnancy I had high blood pressure and one I had a hematoma on my uterus and with my last pregnancy I had gestational diabetes
I mean faxed lol dang auto correct

Remember sometimes it's hard to switch doctors later in the game, I got lucky switching to my new OB at 12 weeks because he said he doesn't take patients after the 12 week mark, especially if they're having pregnancy related issues. Call ASAP and see if you can get in. The new OB can test you for anything they need, and they can perform the 2nd half of the test you need, they will get all of your information from your previous OB so you may not have to be retested
Man.I don't see myself driving an hour away to the hospital in labor with number 4 lol I am waiting on the new ob to call back she was having computer issues lol

I just switched to an OB an hour away because I'm not comfortable with my previous OB. I LOVE my new doctor, and so glad I did it! I'll be driving an hour in the middle of the winter, that's my only worry.. but I'll be fine! If you're on baby number 4, I can't blame you AT ALL! Haha, this is only my 2nd so I take him along with me!
I have my appt with the new ob  :-) they want me to come.in Thursday at 9:45
Awesome, glad you got in and hope you like him/her!!

question: Ok so I moved almost an hour from where I use to live and my Dr is out there well I was doing to change to a new Dr but the old ob talked me out of it because I did the first part of the first trimester screening so my next appt is sept 25 they are also testing me early for gestational diabetes since I had it with my last pregnancy anyway when should I make an appt with the new  ob should.I go ahead and call to make an appt
title: advice
